summary: This is an email chain from December 2018 between attorneys Sigrid McCawley and an unnamed sender, discussing ongoing settlement negotiations involving Jeffrey Epstein. McCawley reports that David (likely David Boies) is in contact with Epstein and working to finalize a deal, and that she will check if Epstein's lawyer has responded in writing.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, communicating about settlement negotiations involving Jeffrey Epstein. She is providing an update on the status of a potential deal.

events.title: Email Update on Epstein Settlement
events.description: Sigrid McCawley sends an email update stating that David is working to finalize a deal with Jeffrey Epstein and that she will check if Epstein's lawyer has provided anything in writing.

events.title: Inquiry About Settlement News
events.description: An unnamed sender emails Sigrid McCawley asking for any news on the settlement negotiations with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: In December 2018, attorneys were actively engaged in settlement negotiations with Jeffrey Epstein.
Attorney David (likely David Boies) was in direct contact with Epstein regarding finalizing a deal.
The communication anticipates a written response from Jeffrey Epstein's lawyer.
The email is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege.
The correspondence involves high-profile attorneys from Boies Schiller Flexner LLP.
